summary: Craft all the Dawnguard stuff on all the forge in skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------------
DAWNGUARD TOOLS - CRAFTING
--------------------------------------
Introduction
Installation
Disinstallation
-----------------
INTRODUCTION
-----------------
This mod allows you to craft all items present in the first expansion (DLC) for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim called Dawnguard. Simple you can craft on all the blacksmith forge present in skyrim.
-----------------
INSTALLATION
-----------------
Extract DAWNGUARD TOOLS-Crafting.esp in your data folder in Steam\\SteamApps\\Common\\
--------------------
DISINSTALLATION
--------------------
Delete DAWNGUARD TOOLS-Crafting.esp



Tank You for Download and ENJOY
author: DonVito96
